originalText.text: I believe I purchased the very last Land Rover Convertible.   I love the care but there were definitely some learning curves with maintaining the vehicle.  Manhattan JLR were amazingly supportive both financially and with service.  I am very appreciative!!!!!

text.text: I believe I purchased the very last Land Rover Convertible.   I love the care but there were definitely some learning curves with maintaining the vehicle.  Manhattan JLR were amazingly supportive both financially and with service.  I am very appreciative!!!!!

originalText.text: Five stars for the great staff at the Service Center. I dealt with Cristian V. as my Service Consultant and he was very responsive and transparent about a repair on my 2016 Land Rover which was still under extended warranty for a specific part/issue. Cristian was communicative during the repair and clearly confirmed the diagnostic pricing in case it was not covered. While I would not normally bring my vehicle here for any other out-of-warranty repair due to high labor costs and the location relative to where I live, dealing with the service center is usually a breeze and I was happy to bring my car in.

originalText.text: I recently purchased a 2024 Range Rover Sport from James Zaku, and had a great experience. He was professional, knowledgable, communicative and transparent through the whole process. I will be back to see James and the staff at Land Rover Manhattan again soon.

text.text: I recently purchased a 2024 Range Rover Sport from James Zaku, and had a great experience. He was professional, knowledgable, communicative and transparent through the whole process. I will be back to see James and the staff at Land Rover Manhattan again soon.

originalText.text:
I recently had a disappointing experience with the Land Rover service department. Brought my car in for a diagnostic, but the process was slow and communication was lacking. The staff seemed unorganized, and it took longer than expected to get any updates on my vehicle's status. Overall, a frustrating experience that left me questioning the efficiency of their service department. My dissatisfaction with the Land Rover service department deepened when, after being assured my car was ready for pickup, I found myself stranded less than 24 hours later. The engine light illuminated, and my car wouldn't start, casting doubt on the accuracy of their diagnostic and leaving me with an inconvenient and unexpected breakdown. The lack of reliability in their service is concerning and has significantly impacted my trust in their capabilities. For context I have a 2020 Range Rover sport with 32k miles

Current update in real time

After my review, I have been in contact with Javier. He, along with his colleague Shelly, are actively addressing my concerns and working towards ensuring my car receives the correct service. They are also arranging for a loaner, demonstrating a commitment to rectifying the situation and minimizing further inconvenience. I appreciate their efforts to resolve the issues and hope for a smoother resolution moving forward.

originalText.text: Can't say enough good things about this dealership. Isaac Ashwal who is the General Manager is really fantastic. Recently purchased a Velar SE and the dealership made the purchase so  easy. I live an hour from the dealership and the experience and the ease of the transaction was well worth the trip.  Highly recommend!!
